about_the_game:
The game supports Free Multiplayer CO-OP. Join our Discord community (click discord icon on the right panel) to claim multiplayer code and start free trial. Moreover, complete special in-game tasks to unlock Crazy Mode and exclusive avatar!

👻 Exploration In Haunted Mansion

Horror Simulator:Prologue is a heart-pounding horror adventure. Demons are said to lurk within the mansion, terrorizing countless victims. Legends suggest knowing a demon's true name grants control over it. Now, brave souls like you must form a team of exorcists, delve deep into the mansion to uncover the demon's name, capture and vanquish it for rich rewards.

🕸 Immersive Gameplay

Hunt various demons representing the seven deadly sins.

Use 7 sacramental items as evidence to reveal each sin.

Play solo or 3-player co-op with real-time voice chat. Even when a teammate dies they can use items to assist their living teammates.

😱 Hunt Mode

Demons will do everything to scare you off, or even kill you. Once your sanity runs out, demons will initiate hunt mode. Find out the demon's name before your sanity is drained.

Real-time voice chat lets you strategize and improve your chances of success—while you're still alive. In ghost mode, you can use items to guide teammates.

🙀 Shop System

Complete your tasks in each run to earn coins which let you buy skins and items in the store. Customize your Exorcist avatar, but be warned -- just because you look cool doesn't mean the demons will let you off easy.

Dare to venture forth?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA®GeForce® GTX 1650s / AMD Radeon™ RX5300
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • VR Support: Open XR，requires motion controllers. Support Valve Index, Quest 2 and Quest 3
  • Additional Notes: VR Only
